apple.name: Apple
apple.description: An apple a day keeps the doctor away... if you throw it hard enough.

cherry.name: Cherry
cherry.description: Life is just a bowl of these, just watch out for the pits.

coconut.name: Coconut
coconut.description: I'm absolutely coco-nuts for this fruit.

orange.name: Orange
orange.description: Orange you glad I didn't say banana?

peach.name: Peach
peach.description: Feeling fuzzy? Well, this fruit is peachy keen.

pear.name: Pear
pear.description: We make a great pear, sweet and refreshing.
